name: Tower Rush (SoloBro)
description:
Tower Rush

Race against countless bots as you all try to get to the top of the tower! The player and the bots can push each other, making this platformer much more challenging. The bots will even push each other!

Controls:

  • Walk - A/D or left and right arrow keys
  • Run - Hold shift
  • Jump - Space
  • Push - Enter
  • Pause/Quit - Esc

You may play this game in the browser (above) or by downloading it (bottom of page)

I hope you enjoy :)

Made as a submission to ZenoJam 6, with the theme "Going Up"
